name: Outpost Piggy: Morgue Escape
description:
You are in a hospital corridor where fear and horror intertwine.
You feel fear and death plague you every step of the way.

In a haunted hospital that contains paranormal activity and a scarry piggy trying to kill you, it is very difficult to survive if your nerves are not as hard as steel.

Extraordinary atmosphere, jittery storyline and blood-curdling circulation, you are one step ahead of cartoon horror game.

In the second story, 2 death bodies will not leave the you alone . you need to find keys and hide from theme or the will kill you and burn you .
Enjoy the game !
